title: bugsplat notifcation keeps popping up each time I launch League...
body:
This has happened ever since I try to set my files to launch the legacy client instead, since I disliked the new client and that everything loaded and ran slow. 

I just uninstalled and reinstalled League of legends again but the same thing is still happening... And I also did repair from what I read in the support if there was a problem, but it STILL pops up

replies.body: There may be a PC setting or security config that's failing to load necessary files and launch the client.  Try out our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help get this fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions!
im having the exact same problem
